count_composition_year:
SELECT ?year (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated)) AS ?year)
}
GROUP BY ?year
ORDER BY ?year
count_compositions_composers_decade:
SELECT ?decade (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions) (COUNT(DISTINCT ?composer) AS ?numberOfComposers)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition schema:composer ?composer .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade
count_resources_by_location:
SELECT DISTINCT ?location ?locationLabel (COUNT(?resource) AS ?locationCount)
WHERE {
  ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5320 .
  ?resource cto:relatedLocation ?location .
  ?location rdfs:label ?locationLabel .
}
GROUP BY ?location ?locationLabel
ORDER BY DESC(?locationCount)
count_concerts_by_decade_location:
SELECT DISTINCT ?decade ?location ?locationName (COUNT(?concert) AS ?concertCount) WHERE {
  ?concert cto:elementOf n4c:E5320 .
  ?concert rdfs:label ?name .
  ?concert cto:relatedLocation ?location .
  OPTIONAL { ?location rdfs:label ?locationName . }
  FILTER(REGEX(?name, "\\b\\d{1,2}\\.\\d{1,2}\\.\\d{4}\\b")) .
  BIND(REPLACE(?name, ".*?(\\d{4}).*", "$1") AS ?year) .
  BIND(CONCAT(STR(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?year) / 10) * 10), "s") AS ?decade) .
}
GROUP BY ?decade ?location ?locationName
ORDER BY DESC(?concertCount)
count_concerts_by_decade_dresden:
SELECT DISTINCT ?decade ?location ?locationName (COUNT(?concert) AS ?concertCount) WHERE {
  ?concert cto:elementOf n4c:E5320 .
  ?concert rdfs:label ?name .
  ?concert cto:relatedLocation ?location .
  OPTIONAL { ?location rdfs:label ?locationName . }
  FILTER(REGEX(?name, "\\b\\d{1,2}\\.\\d{1,2}\\.\\d{4}\\b")) .
  BIND(REPLACE(?name, ".*?(\\d{4}).*", "$1") AS ?year) .
  BIND(CONCAT(STR(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?year) / 10) * 10), "s") AS ?decade) .
  FILTER(CONTAINS(?locationName, "Dresden"))
}
GROUP BY ?decade ?location ?locationName
ORDER BY DESC(?concertCount)
filter_resources_with_decade:
SELECT DISTINCT ?resource ?period ?tcover ?extractedYear ?decade WHERE {
  ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5313 .
  ?resource schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?resource cto:creationPeriod ?period .
  ?resource schema:temporalCoverage ?tcover .
  FILTER (DATATYPE(?period) = xsd:string && REGEX(?period, "\\d{4}")) .
  BIND (REPLACE(STR(?period), ".*?(\\d{4}).*", "$1") AS ?extractedYear) .
  BIND (CONCAT(STR(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?extractedYear) / 10) * 10), "s") AS ?decade) .
}
ORDER BY ASC(?period)
count_resources_by_decade:
SELECT DISTINCT ?decade (COUNT(?resource) AS ?resourceCount) WHERE {
  ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5313 .
  ?resource cto:creationPeriod ?period .
  FILTER (DATATYPE(?period) = xsd:string && REGEX(?period, "\\d{4}")) .
  BIND (REPLACE(STR(?period), ".*?(\\d{4}).*", "$1") AS ?extractedYear) .
  BIND (CONCAT(STR(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?extractedYear) / 10) * 10), "s") AS ?decade) .
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ASC(?decade)
